price: 57 Là, ils verront tous leurs désirs exaucés et se délecteront des fruits les plus délicieux.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
